home.readyMessage: Ready to crush your goals today?

pausedWorkout.inProgress: You have a workout in progress!
pausedWorkout.discardPromptMessage: Are you sure you want to discard this paused workout session? This action cannot be undone.
pausedWorkout.summaryMessage: You have executed {{exercisesDone}} of {{exercisesAvailable}} exercises, with {{setsDone}} set(s) logged{{targetSetsInfo}}. Elapsed time: {{timeElapsed}}. Resume the workout to continue it.
pausedWorkout.noPausedWorkoutFound: No paused workout found to resume

quickActions.startNewSessionDescription: Start a brand new session and refine it as you do it
quickActions.logActivityDescription: Record other activities like hiking, football, or yoga
quickActions.myRoutinesDescription: View, create, or edit your workout routines
quickActions.workoutHistoryDescription: Review your past workout logs and progress
quickActions.profileAndSettingsDescription: Manage your data and app preferences
quickActions.personalGymDescription: Manage your available workout equipment and accessories
quickActions.weightToolkitDescription: An all-in-one lifting toolkit. Instantly calculate plate math, percentages, 1RM, RPE, and official powerlifting scores

player.title: Workout Player Settings
player.playerModeDescription: Choose between Compact and Focus player
player.weightIncrementDescription: Default step for +/- weight buttons in player (in {{unit}})
player.weightIncrementError: Must be a positive number (e.g., 2.5 or 5). Max 50.
player.countdownSoundDescription: Play sound X seconds before a timed set ends

progressiveOverload.title: Progressive Overload
progressiveOverload.enableDescription: Automatically increase weight or reps based on performance.
progressiveOverload.strategyDescription: Choose what to increase when you meet your goals.
progressiveOverload.strategyError: Please select at least one strategy.
progressiveOverload.sessionsToIncrementDescription: Increase after completing this many workouts for an exercise successfully.

dataManagement.title: Data Management
dataManagement.exportDescription: Save all your data to a JSON file.
dataManagement.importDescription: Import from a JSON backup file.
dataManagement.syncTooltip: This will scan all workout logs to update the "Last Used" date for every exercise in your library. Run this if the dates seem out of sync after an import or an update.

exerciseLibrary.title: Exercise library
exerciseLibrary.description: View all the available exercise and add your own ones

achievements.title: Your Achievements
achievements.description: View all your tracked Personal Bests

general.title: General & Appearance
general.languageDescription: Choose the display language for the app.

toasts.upgradeSuccess: You are now on the {{status}} tier!
toasts.upgradeGratitude: Thank you for supporting the app! All premium features are now unlocked.
toasts.routinesDisabledOnImport: Import detected {{count}} enabled routines. Free users can only have 4 enabled routines. All imported routines have been disabled. You can enable them after upgrading to Premium.

alerts.playerModeChangeDisabledMessage: It's not possible to change the player mode during a workout session. Please complete or discard your current workout first.
alerts.invalidFields: Please fill in all required fields correctly: at least age, height and weight should be filled.
alerts.invalidFileType: Invalid file type. Please select a JSON file.
alerts.invalidBackupFormat: Invalid backup file format. Expected an object.
alerts.backupVersionTooNew: Backup version {{version}} is newer than the app's supported version {{appVersion}}. Please update the app.
alerts.importWarning: Importing data will try to MERGE your current data with the IMPORTED one. Are you sure?
alerts.errorProcessingFile: Error processing backup file. Ensure it is valid JSON.
alerts.clearAllDataWarningMessage: This will delete ALL your workout data, profile, and settings. This cannot be undone. Are you sure?
alerts.clearAllDataConfirmationMessage: To confirm, please type "DELETE" in the input below. This will delete ALL your workout data, profile, and settings. This cannot be undone.
alerts.clearAllDataCancelledMessage: Data clearing cancelled. No changes made.
alerts.clearAllDataSuccessMessage: All application data has been cleared
alerts.syncFullHistoryMessage: This will scan all workout logs to update the "Last Used" date for all exercises AND the "Last Performed" date for all routines. This may take a moment. Proceed?

todaysWorkout.noWorkoutPlanned: No workout planned in your program for this day
todaysWorkout.activateProgramPrompt: Activate a program to see your future schedule
todaysWorkout.viewProgramDetailsTooltip: Click to navigate to program details

card.favouriteTooltip: Click to filter for favourites. Long-press for unmark as favourite

noRoutines.noRoutinesMessage: Get started by creating your first workout routine.

toasts.generationFailed: Could not generate a workout with the selected criteria. Please try again.
toasts.retryFailed: Failed to generate a new workout. Please try adjusting your options.

alerts.editRunningMessage: It's not possible to edit a running routine. Complete it or discard it before doing it.
alerts.deleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete the routine "{{name}}"?
alerts.deleteWithLogs: This will also delete {{count}} associated workout log(s).
alerts.deleteWithPrograms: This will also delete the entries in {{count}} associated program(s).
alerts.deleteWithOneProgram: This will also delete the entries in '{{name}}' associated program(s).
alerts.pausedWorkoutMessage: You have a paused workout ("{{name}}" from {{date}}). What would you like to do?
alerts.unhideMessage: Would you like to unhide {{name}} from hidden ones?
alerts.unmarkFavouriteMessage: Would you like to unmark {{name}} from favourites?

noResults.noMatchMessage: Try adjusting your filters or view all entries by resetting them
noResults.noDataMessage: There is no data here yet. Time to get active!

toasts.filteredByProgram: Showing logs filtered out by training program
toasts.filteredByRoutine: Showing logs filtered out by routine name
toasts.noLogsOnDay: No activities logged on this day

alerts.noRoutineMessage: There is no routine associated with this log: would you like to create one? If so remember to link it to this log once created
alerts.deleteLogMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this workout log? This action cannot be undone
alerts.deleteActivityMessage: Are you sure you want to delete the log for "{{name}}"? This action cannot be undone.
alerts.pausedWorkoutMessage: There's a pending workout: do you want to discard this paused workout session and log a new one? This action cannot be undone.

noPrograms.noProgramsMessage: Create a structured program to follow your routines.

calendar.noActiveProgramMessage: Please activate a program to see its schedule.
calendar.selectProgramMessage: Choose an active program to view its calendar.

toasts.logFailed: Cannot log session: No active program is being viewed.

alerts.programActiveMessage: What would you like to do?
alerts.finishMessage: Are you sure you want to mark this program as completed?
alerts.selectProgramMessage: Choose a program to view in the calendar.

filters.title: Filter Statistics by Date
filters.dateOrderError: 'From Date' cannot be after 'To Date'. Filters not applied

charts.noData: Not enough data for this chart.
charts.timelineRequirement: Timeline view requires at least two weeks of data.

tables.noWeeklyData: No weekly data to display for this period
tables.noMuscleData: No muscle group performance data to display for this period

noData.inPeriodTitle: No Workout Data in Selected Period
noData.inPeriodMessage: Try adjusting the date range or reset filters to view all-time statistics

noPBs.noMatchTitle: No Personal Bests Match Your Filters
noPBs.noMatchMessage: Try adjusting your filter criteria or
noPBs.noPBsMessage: Keep logging your workouts to track your progress and achievements here

toasts.logNotFound: Could not find the associated workout log for this personal best. It's possible that the related workout session has been removed.
toasts.recalcError: An error occurred while trying to recalculate personal bests.
toasts.resetError: An error occurred while trying to reset personal bests.
toasts.trendError: Cannot show trend: Missing exercise ID or PB type.

compactPlayer.allSetsDone: All planned sets are done. Well done!

insights.title: Performance Insights
insights.noSetsCompleted: No sets completed yet for this exercise in this workout.
insights.noPreviousPerformance: No previous performance recorded for this exercise.
insights.noPBs: No personal bests recorded for this exercise yet.

toasts.noSetsLoggedError: No sets logged. Workout not saved.

toasts.noFieldsToRemove: No fields can be removed from this set.

alerts.toughWorkoutMessage: Your last session felt challenging. Would you like to automatically reduce the intensity for today?
alerts.lightWorkoutMessage: Your last session felt light. Would you like to automatically increase the intensity for today?
alerts.pausedWorkoutMessage: You have a paused workout session. Would you like to resume it?
alerts.quitMessage: Quit workout? Unsaved progress (if not paused) will be lost
alerts.removeLastRoundMessage: This is the last round of the superset. Removing it will delete the entire superset from the workout. Continue?
alerts.removeRoundMessage: This will remove Round {{number}} from all exercises in this superset and clear any logged data for it. Are you sure?
alerts.removeSetMessage: Are you sure you want to remove the set from {{name}}?
alerts.removeLastSetMessage: This will also remove the exercise from the workout. Continue?

alerts.removeExerciseMessage: Are you sure you want to remove {{name}}?
alerts.removeExerciseLoggedMessage: Are you sure you want to remove {{name}}? All logged data for this exercise in this session will be lost.
alerts.sessionNotesMessage: Add or edit notes for this entire workout session.
